io.github.kensuke1984.kibrary.external

クラス DSMMPI

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.kensuke1984.kibrary.external.DSMMPI

  • public final class DSMMPI
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility for execution of DSM software such as tish and tipsv .
    They must be in PATH. When you run, mpirun also must be in PATH.

    All standard write and standard error will be thrown in the same way as the current process.

    The MPI process will run in the same directory as an input information file, so that you do not care about working folder. (If your information file is tricky, ... ...)

    • フィールドのサマリー

      フィールド 
      修飾子とタイプ フィールドと説明
      static boolean psvExists 
      static boolean shExists 

    • メソッドのサマリー

      すべてのメソッド staticメソッド concreteメソッド 
      修飾子とタイプ メソッドと説明
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      Example: -NP 8 -psv hogePSV.inf fooPSV.inf -sh hogeSH.inf fooSH.inf -NP is optional.
      static java.util.concurrent.Callable<java.lang.Integer> tipsv(int np, java.nio.file.Path information)
      Executes: mpirun -NP `NP` mpi-tipsv < `information` Before the execution, current directory will be the same as the `information` Note that 'mpi-tipsv' must be in $HOME/bin
      static java.util.concurrent.Callable<java.lang.Integer> tish(int np, java.nio.file.Path information)
      Executes: mpirun -NP `NP` mpi-tish < `information` Before the execution, current directory will be the same as the `information` Note that 'mpi-tish' must be in PATH (checked by which).

      • クラスから継承されたメソッド java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • フィールドの詳細

      • psvExists

        public static final boolean psvExists

      • shExists

        public static final boolean shExists

    • メソッドの詳細

      • tipsv

        public static java.util.concurrent.Callable<java.lang.Integer> tipsv(int np,
                                                                     java.nio.file.Path information)
        Executes: mpirun -NP `NP` mpi-tipsv < `information` Before the execution, current directory will be the same as the `information` Note that 'mpi-tipsv' must be in $HOME/bin
        パラメータ:
        np - the number of MPI thread
        information - for DSM (tipsv)
        戻り値:
        Callable<Integer> for tipsv returning value is exit code.

      • tish

        public static java.util.concurrent.Callable<java.lang.Integer> tish(int np,
                                                                    java.nio.file.Path information)
        Executes: mpirun -NP `NP` mpi-tish < `information` Before the execution, current directory will be the same as the `information` Note that 'mpi-tish' must be in PATH (checked by which).
        パラメータ:
        np - the number of MPI thread
        information - for DSM (tish)
        戻り値:
        Callable<Integer> for tish and its returning value is exit code.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.nio.file.NoSuchFileException
        Example: -NP 8 -psv hogePSV.inf fooPSV.inf -sh hogeSH.inf fooSH.inf -NP is optional. Default is the number of threads in user's environment.
        パラメータ:
        args - arguments for DSMMPI
        例外:
        java.nio.file.NoSuchFileException - if any
